name: gre-vs-industry
description: Debate about taking the GRE while balancing industry prep.

events.content: Worth taking the GRE while juggling senior project? Thinking about grad school later.
If grad school isnâ€™t immediate, skip it. GRE scores expire in 5 years and prep will eat your CSC 462 time.
Agreed. Focus on industry interviews now. You can prep for the GRE the summer before you apply.
Makes sense. Shelving the GRE for now.
